## RelayedTransactionV1Builder.setInnerTransaction() method

Sets the inner transaction to be used. It has to be already signed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInnerTransaction(transaction: Transaction): RelayedTransactionV1Builder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  transaction | [Transaction](./sdk-core.transaction.md) | The inner transaction to be used |

**Returns:**

[RelayedTransactionV1Builder](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv1builder.md)
